name: E-Commerce Platform Redesign
description: Complete overhaul of the existing e-commerce platform with modern UI/UX and improved performance
scope: Frontend redesign, backend optimization, mobile responsiveness, and payment gateway integration
goals: Improve user experience and conversion rates
Implement responsive design for all devices

name: Mobile App Development
description: Native mobile application for iOS and Android with real-time notifications and offline capabilities
scope: Cross-platform mobile development, API integration, push notifications, and offline data sync
goals: Launch on both App Store and Google Play

name: API Microservices Migration
description: Migrate monolithic backend to microservices architecture for better scalability and maintainability
scope: Service decomposition, containerization, API gateway setup, and monitoring implementation

name: Data Analytics Dashboard
description: Business intelligence dashboard with real-time analytics and reporting capabilities
scope: Data pipeline setup, visualization components, real-time updates, and user role management

name: Security Enhancement Project
description: Comprehensive security audit and implementation of advanced security measures
scope: Security assessment, vulnerability fixes, authentication improvements, and compliance implementation

name: Customer Support Portal
description: Self-service customer support portal with ticketing system and knowledge base
scope: Portal development, ticketing system, knowledge base, chat integration, and admin dashboard

name: DevOps Pipeline Automation
description: Automate CI/CD pipelines with comprehensive testing and deployment strategies
scope: Pipeline setup, automated testing, deployment automation, and monitoring integration
goals: Reduce deployment time to under 10 minutes

name: Inventory Management System
description: Advanced inventory tracking system with barcode scanning and automated reordering
scope: Inventory tracking, barcode integration, automated alerts, reporting, and supplier management

name: Machine Learning Recommendation Engine
description: AI-powered recommendation system for personalized user experiences
scope: ML model development, data preprocessing, API integration, and performance optimization

name: Cloud Infrastructure Migration
description: Migration of existing infrastructure to cloud-native solutions with auto-scaling capabilities
scope: Cloud architecture design, data migration, service containerization, and monitoring setup
